raw_body: Dr WIJENAIKE – AMARAPALA – aged 96,​ husband of late Sri,​ father of Susie and Nishan,​ father- in-law of Jeremy and Genevieve,​ grandfather of Christianna and Nuwan,​ brother of late Noel,​ peacefully passed away on 30th November 2023 at his home. His remains will lie at Jayaratne Restpect Home on Saturday,​ 2nd December from 10.00 am onwards and Cremation at 4.00 pm at Kanatta Crematorium,​ entrance opposite Devi Balika Borella.078713
